item.title: Watch Nobel Prize-winning economist Joseph Stiglitz explain globalization in three minutes
item.description:
Watch Nobel Prize-winning economist Joseph Stiglitz explain globalization in three minutes

Watch Nobel Prize-winning economist Joseph Stiglitz explain a contested and complex phenomenon: globalization.

item.title: Underwater Dogs: photographs of dogs underwater by Seth Casteel
item.description:
Underwater Dogs: photographs of dogs underwater by Seth Casteel

Underwater Dogs - a book containing over 80 unique photographs of dogs underwater snapped by animal photographer Seth Casteel is published on 25th October 2012 by Headline Books, priced £14.99.

item.title: Space odyssey: photographer Thomas Ruff heads to the moon with new work.
item.description:
Space odyssey: photographer Thomas Ruff heads to the moon with new work.

The DÃ¼sseldorf photographer Thomas Ruff is having his day in the sun, with the Art Gallery of Ontario's 'Object Relations', a major solo show, opening this month. Closer to home, Chelsea's David Zwirner Gallery is celebrating Ruff's latest series of work.

item.title: Dogs and Peanut Butter: A Match Made in Photo Book Heaven
item.description:
Dogs and Peanut Butter: A Match Made in Photo Book Heaven

If you have a dog, you know the magic of the substance known as peanut butter-a small smudge on their nose and they'll be busy for the next 30 minutes. And now, animal photographer Greg Murray is capturing this magic in his photo book For the Love of Peanut Butter .
